attributes.additional_details:
As speaking to the local authority didn't seem to work I am petitioning for more dog bins in the Abronhill Area of Cumbernauld. There are a number of area's where there are not enough bins in area's regularly walked by dog owners, if bins were in place it would significantly decrease the amount of dog feces that is not being picked up.

Specific areas where there is not enough bins
In Almond Road there are 4 different areas lacking bins
In Elm Drive there is 2 areas lacking bins
In Oak Road there is around 5 areas lacking bins
The list is endless

The dog warden comes out only when a complaint is made and rarely at the times when owners are out.

So it's time we as residents of Abronhill start making our voices heard.

I am a responsible dog owner Who would like others to be considered and to help get these bins put in to make our community a nicer place to stay.
